content:
S-waiting-on-author
not pinged:
#75737 opened on Aug 20, 2020 by davidtwco â€¢ Approved last updated Jan 14 - already has approval but hasn't been touched in a long while...

#80918 opened on Jan 11 by yoshuawuyts updated 16 days ago yoshuawuyts commented "Hey! Yeah sorry, I've been out for the past month"
#71482 opened on Apr 23, 2020 by estebank last updated on Apr 23, 2020 - merge conflicts, but rust team member so not pinging

pinged:
#82459 opened on Feb 23 by tesuji - updated Feb 24 - author lists status as "Gonna rest for a long time. Please pick up my PRs if I don't respond in a month."
#82272 opened on Feb 18 by b-naber last updated Mar 8 - merge conflict
#82324 opened on Feb 20 by eltociear - updated on Feb 20 - closed inactive - all this for a spelling typo?
#83496 opened 17 days ago by Aehmlo updated 17 days ago - joshtriplett commented 16 days ago: "This should not be insta-stable. It should be marked as unstable, with a tracking issue and a feature gate." - not sure about the process here - is this something for the author to do?
#82659 opened on Mar 1 by zesterer updated on Mar 3 - pinged for additional status
#79173 opened on Nov 18, 2020 by DeveloperC286 updated 23 days ago - pinged to fix additional merge conflict

S-waiting-on-review
Mark-Simulacrum
#83438 opened 19 days ago by CDirkx updated 17 days ago - moved to reviewer - CDirkx commented 17 days ago - Merge conflict has been resolved.

nikic

sfackler

This should not be insta stable

Yes, this is something for the author to do - they need to update the feature gate and open a tracking issue.

#82324 opened on Feb 20 by eltociear - updated on Feb 20 - closed inactive - all this for a spelling typo?

I opened a replacement PR to fix the typo: #84141

Waiting on review:

add the bool::not method. S-waiting-on-review T-libs #82786 opened on Mar 4 by Lokathor updated 16 days ago and assigned to @m-ou-se

Remove P: Unpin bound on impl Future for Pin A-async-await A-pin S-waiting-on-review T-libs #81363 opened on Jan 24 by jonhoo updated 16 days ago and assigned to @cramertj

rustdoc: links from items in a trait impl are inconsistent S-waiting-on-review T-rustdoc #83068 opened on Mar 12 by mockersf updated 16 days ago and assigned to @GuillaumeGomez

test/codegen: add UEFI cross-compilation test A-cross A-testsuite O-UEFI S-waiting-on-review #72321 opened on May 18, 2020 by dvdhrm updated 15 days ago and assigned to @joshtriplett

Allow deriving Into for primitive enums S-waiting-on-review S-waiting-on-team T-lang T-libs #81642 opened on Feb 1 by illicitonion updated 15 days ago and assigned to @estebank

Move std::sys_common::alloc to new module std::sys::common S-waiting-on-review T-libs-impl #82492 opened on Feb 24 by CDirkx updated 15 days ago and assigned to @m-ou-se

Add support for powerpc64le-unknown-freebsd S-waiting-on-review #83572 opened 17 days ago and assigned to by pkubaj updated 15 days ago and assigned to @estebank

Recover from if (let ...) in parsing, instead of lowering S-waiting-on-review #83407 opened 21 days ago and assigned to by osa1 updated 15 days ago and assigned to @estebank

Add u8::to_digit method S-waiting-on-review #83447 opened 20 days ago and assigned to by coolreader18 updated 15 days ago and assigned to @kennytm
Had been a little busy with others things today and will do triage work tomorrow.

Charles Lew said:

Had been a little busy with others things today and will do triage work tomorrow.

it is okay, if you wish to skip this week, that's totally fine

Friday, Apr 16th, 2021 (actually 17th now)
S-waiting-on-author
